src_original: 4. tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhaḥ /
yathā dharmī śabdo 'nitya iti viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ /
tgt_original: tadyathā |  anitye śabde sādhye ghaṭādiranityaḥ sapakṣaḥ ||
vipakṣo yatra sādhyaṃ nāsti |  yannityaṃ tadakṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśamiti |
tatra sādhyāvyāvṛtto yathā |  nityaḥ śabdo'mūrtatvāt paramāṇuvat |

src_original: iha paramāṇurvaidharmyadṛṣṭānta iti sādhanadharmo 'mūrttatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ mūrttatvātparamāṇunām /
tgt_original: yadanityaṃ tanmurtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā paramāṇuḥ |  paramāṇorhi sādhānadharmo'mūrtatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ mūrtatvātparamāṇunāmiti |

src_original: iha sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ karmaṇo 'nityatvāt sādhanadharmo na vyāvṛtto 'mūrttatvātkarmaṇaḥ //
1. sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ caiva sābhāsaṃ parasaṃvide /  pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ tvātmasaṃvide //
tgt_original: sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ caiva sābhāsaṃ parasaṃvide |  pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ tvātmasaṃvide ||-
tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvat |  yatra hetoḥ sapakṣa evāstitvaṃ khyāpyate |  tadyathā |
nityaśabdenātrānityatvasyābhāva ucyate |  akṛtakaśabdenāpi kṛtakatvasyābhāvaḥ |  yathā bhāvābhāvo'bhāva iti ||  uktāḥ pakṣādayaḥ ||  eṣāṃ vacanāni parapratyāyanakāle sādhanam |

src_original: 2. vādinā svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭo 'rthaḥ sādhyaḥ /  yena sādhyate tatsādhanam //
tgt_original: tatra pakṣādivacanāni sādhanam |  pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntavacanairhi prāśnikānāmapratīto'rthaḥ pratipādyata iti ||  tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭatayā svayaṃ sādhyatvenepsitaḥ |  pratyakṣadyaviruddha iti vākyaśeṣaḥ |  tadyathā |  nityaḥ śabdo'nityo veti ||

src_original: pakṣe sattvameva prathamaṃ rūpam /  sapakṣa eva sattvamiti dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
tgt_original: pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣe cāsattvamiti |  kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ |
